name: South Pennines Day Ranger
description:
SOUTH PENNINES DAY RANGER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for one day extending from Bradford and Leeds in the north to Sheffield and Dronfield in the south and Manchester in the west to 
      Castleford in the east.
